name: Duncan and the Wisp
description:
In Duncan & The Wisp, you play as Duncan who is sent on an ordinary errand but soon discovers a mysterious and imminent danger about to plague his world! Accompanied by your friend Wisp in this Top Down Point-and-Click Adventure game, you must travel through multiple dungeons and reunite the elemental gems to the Staff of Ancients and banish The Shadow! Help Duncan succeed in his journey by using multiple elemental attacks, summons, and abilities!\

Designers Portfolio Sites:
Roy Bennett - http://www.roybennettiv.com
Jeremy Hadley - https://jhadleysite.wordpress.com
Jeremiah Hughes - https://jeremiahhughes.wordpress.com
Josephine Dolan - https://josiwashere.wixsite.com/digitalportfolio
Joseph Cavazos - https://jacavazos.myportfolio.com
Mollica Es - https://mollicaes.wixsite.com/gamedesign

DISCLAIMER: This is a project completed by students. We ask that you please try to be forgiving toward any bugs you may encounter. We did the best we could within the time we were given and the skills we had at the time! We hope you still get to enjoy the game as a whole despite its flaws. Thanks for checking it out!
